original_text:
He rescued me from my strong enemy
    and from those who hated me,
    for they were too mighty for me.
korean_text: 나를 강한 원수와 미워하는 자에게서 건지셨음이여 그들은 나보다 힘이 세기 때문이로다

sentences.original_text: He rescued me from my strong enemy
and from those who hated me
for they were too mighty for me.
